title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise as investors look ahead to Fed rate decision - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise as investors look ahead to Fed rate decision  Yahoo Finance
description: Wall Street’s main benchmarks advanced Tuesday alongside a sharp pullback in oil prices, which in recent weeks have surged on fears the war in Ukraine will will cut global economic growth. Investors also weighed fresh data out of Washington that showed U.S. producer prices were unchanged in February for the first time in at least a year — a sign the tide may be turning on inflation.
